release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 4.1.1 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Modified to throw a cleaner error message when attempting to register a product with a LID greater than 256 characters. Inherited from registry-core.
Modified the Installation document to address installation of two Registry Service instances, one for PDS3 content and one for PDS4 content.
Modified to retain slot type for slots in a versioned product. Inherited from registry-core.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 4.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added filters in the RegistryPackage object for guid, name, lid and status. Inherited from registry-core.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 4.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Fix replication issue that was causing a null pointer exception. Inherited from registry-core.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 3.1.1 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Address random database connection issues by using connection pooling.
Allow for replication by object type.
Modified the POM to exclude the jaxb-impl and jaxb-api dependencies which appear to cause memory leak warning messages in the Tomcat Server log.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 3.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Addressed performance issues with publishing and versioning objects. Inherited from registry-core.
Fixed the typo in the username for certain endpoints.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 3.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Updated the supported data object type list based on the v03 information model.
Handle '_' characters when applying filters on registry object. Previously the underscore acted inappropriately as a single character wildcard. Inherited from registry-core.
Updated the Installation document to correspond with the delivered Derby configuration.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 2.2.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Endpoint for updating packages with POST or PUT.
Support package id when versioning extrinsic objects.
Support error handling on service endpoints that update registry objects. When trying to update an object that does not exist an error will be thrown.
Updates to registry objects no longer overwrite key attributes when not provided by the client. Key attributes include home, lid, status, and versionName. Inherited from registry-core.
Remove warning about XMLConstants.FEATURE_SECURE_PROCESSING by using Xerces 2.10.0. Inherited from registry-core.
Removed the parent project's Release Notes document. This document now serves as the single source for this component's release changes.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 2.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Filtering endpoints now support status. Inherited from registry-core.
Cleaned up the documentation and removed the PDF generation feature.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 2.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Ability to page through classifications nodes.
Core association type classification scheme.
Update documentation to include how to create a database and install the registry schema.
Postgres configuration.
Derby tools packaged into distribution.
PDS object type and association type configuration.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 1.2.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: End point to remove package members and update the status of all package members. Inherited from registry-core.
Allow PUT operation to create/update a Service object.
Added end point to manage ExternalLinks which can be used to tie registry contents to URLs that exist outside the registry. Inherited from registry-core.
Added end point to allow for replication from a remote registry. Inherited from registry-core.
End point to page through packages.
Moved registry end points one level removing the redundant /registry from the path.
Registry version now comes back as part of the report end point.
Enchanced Auditable Event end point to allow for better filtering. Now supports eventStart, eventEnd, and requestId. Inherited from registry-core.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 1.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: Ability to page through all services. Inherited from registry-core.
Allow a set of Classifications to be associated with a given registry object. Inherited from registry-core.
End point responses for /registry-service and /registry-service/registry. This merely respond to GET requests for now with link headers pointing to the sub-resources.
Configuration end point to pass in classification schemes and nodes as one XML file. Inherited from registry-core.
Defined RegistryPackage as an intrinsic object. Acts merely as a collection of registered objects through the use of Associations. Inherited from registry-core.
Added ExternalIdentifier support for registered objects. Inherited from registry-core.
Include delete operation for Classifications delete. Inherited from registry-core.
Added improved support for registration and retrieval of service registrations.
Support for MySQL back end. Provided documentation for configuration and property file configuration.
Mapped Product to ExtrinsicObject to align better with information model for registry. Moved all interfaces that ended in product(s) to extrinsic(s). Inherited from registry-core.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 1.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards.
release.action: Ability to deal with Services. This required the addition of Service Bindings and Specification Links as well.
Ability to deal with Classifications. This required the addition of Classification Schemes and Nodes as well.
Interface to retrieve Auditable Events.
Ability to delete products.
Ability to delete associations.
Updated registry status information to include counts on the number of managed items.
Refactored any list response to simply be a RegistryResponse instead of a PagedResponse.
Added a default sort order on slots so they come back in a fixed order on repeated requests. The default order now is their generated id.

Updated persistence layer to be more flexible and require less change as we add new types of RegistryObject's. For example, instead of having saveProduct and saveAssociation there is now a unified saveRegistryObject.
Slot values that were extremely large would truncate. Now they map to @Lob with a length of max integer.
Convert from using userVersion to using versionId for externally tracked versions. Switch to versionName instead of version to align with model.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service is a component of the integrated release 0.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the demonstration at the Management Council Face-to-Face meeting in August 2010.
release.action: Registry Client API support of filtering on products and associations.
Registry client support of ssoToken set for interaction with service.
Filtering for associations within the registry. Same restrictions that apply to the product filtering.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service supports integration with the Registry User Interface developed at Ames.
release.action: Added basic registry client API to support interface development. This is a Java API that abstracts away the URL mappings and serves back Java objects.
Filtering for registered products. This supports the basic retrieve a set of products given some criteria. Is not a full blown search API as that will be dealt with by the Search service.
Documentation integration and updates for service interface. Provides examples and is generated as part of the build.

release.description: This release of the Registry Service supports integration with the Registry User Interface developed at Ames.
release.action: Support for registration of Products.
Support for registration of Associations.
Allow changing of registry object status.
Support for auditable events. This allows us to track the changes made to registry objects.
Added support for persistence to Derby DB for registry back end. This was done using the Java Persistence library.
Spring integration to support injection of components that make up the system. This allows for extensibility by placing how the system is put together in configuration rather than code.
Pluggable identifier generation.
Pluggable version generation.
Support for basic navigation through URLs to registry objects.
